body_html: Interesting, is there any reason that we can’t use a similar logic as StopAtStepHook? Where, rather than checking the step number every time, it runs validation every n steps and then uses the same stop mechanism?
body_text: Interesting, is there any reason that we can’t use a similar logic as StopAtStepHook? Where, rather than checking the step number every time, it runs validation every n steps and then uses the same stop mechanism?
